synopsis.text: Vajra, an alien insectoid race, threatens the survival of the Macross Frontier, a colossal spacecraft housing 10 million humans in search of new planets to colonize. Amidst this interstellar conflict, the renowned galactic singer, Sheryl Nome, arrives on the ship for a concert, only to be suspected as a spy for Galaxy. As conspiracies swirl within the Frontier government, childhood friends Alto Saotome and Ranka Lee strive to realize their dreams against the backdrop of an impending war. This movie, serving as the first part of the Frontier series retelling, unveils the power of music as a valuable human asset, transcending the boundaries of space and reaching beings beyond humanity. The saga concludes in the second movie, The Wings of Goodbye.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
